listSelection.title: Hello, I live here, but don't underestimate me. How about I help you by making you a new pair of shoes?
Warrior shoes? Sure thing, which kind?
Bowman shoes? Sure thing, which kind?
Magician shoes? Sure thing, which kind?
Thief shoes? Sure thing, which kind?

dialogue.text:
